//http://www.codechef.com/problems/PD33
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string s;
	int n,a;
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>a;
		if(a==0)
		return 0;
		cin>>s;
		n=s.length()/a;
		char b[n][a];
		int k=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		for(int j=0;j<a;j++)
		if(k<n*a && i%2==0)
		b[i][j]=s[k++];
		else if(k<n*a && i%2==1)
		b[i][a-1-j]=s[k++];
		for(int i=0;i<a;i++)
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		cout<<b[j][i];
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
